I am a Researcher with the MaineHealth [Center for Interdisciplinary Population and Health Research (CIPHR)](https://mhir.org/center-for-outcomes-research-evaluation-core-draft/). I recently earned a [Population Health Ph.D.](https://bouve.northeastern.edu/programs/population-health-phd/) from [Northeastern University](https://bouve.northeastern.edu/programs/population-health-phd/). My research focuses on improving care for people with cystic fibrosis through the use of real-world data.
